title: Nullable

td.code: resize(const size_type n, const T& t)
print(S& out, const U& nullValue) const

div.b: The type of object, T, stored in the container.
The type of object, T, stored in the container.
The most suitable holder for T.

div.code: template<class Alloc1 > + Nullable: (const Nullable<T, Alloc1>& rhs);

div.b: Returns an iterator pointing to the beginning of the vector.
Returns a const_iterator pointing to the beginning of the vector.
Returns a iterator pointing to the end of the vector.
Returns a const_iterator pointing to the end of the vector.
Returns a reverse_iterator pointing to the beginning of the reversed vector.
Returns a const_reverse_iterator pointing to the beginning of the reversed vector.
Returns a reverse_iterator pointing to the end of the reversed vector.
Returns a const_reverse_iterator pointing to the end of the reversed vector.
Get the current value, or a default one if null.
Get the current value, or a default one if null.
div.code: template<class U > + value: Type (const U& nullValue) const;

ul.li: nullValue The value to use the value is equal to null

div.b: Get a reference to the inner variable.

td.div: A default value will be created if equals to null

td.div: A default value will be created if equals to null

template<class U > + operator=: Nullable& (const U& rhs);

div.b: Get a reference to the inner variable.

td.div: A default value will be created if equals to null

div.b: Returns the size of the container (actually 0 or 1)
Test if the container is empty.
Test if the variable is null.
Insert a new element at the end.

td.div: The old value will be replaced by this new one

div.b: Remove the last element (set the value to NULL)
Swap the content with another nullable object.
div.code: template<class Alloc1 > + swap: void (Nullable<T, Alloc1>& rhs);

div.b: Inserts or erases elements at the end such that the size becomes n.

div.b: Print the value to an stream.
div.code: template<class S , class U > + print: void (S& out, const U& nullValue) const;

Returns the largest possible size of the container.

td.div: Do nothing. Available for compatibility reasons only (STL).
